moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 f6: hmmm, not the best continuation. It opens up the king, and locks up the knight on g8.
moves.3. Nc3: Not the best move for me either. I think I should have played d4.
moves.3... c6 4. d3: Again, I think it would be better to play d4
moves.4... d5 5. b3 Bb4: This stopped me from going Bb2.
moves.6. Bd2 Qb6: Not so sure why he played this.
moves.7. g4: I think I blacked out or something. What a bad move!
moves.7... Bc5: A blunder, and I punished him badly.
moves.8. Na4: Na4, and he resigned. His bishop is lost. The game would be on like this: 8...Bxf2, 9.Ke2, Qc7, 10.Kxf2. He would lose later on. Thank you for watching!
